pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tests for Segregation Distortion in Polyploids // Provides a suite of tests for segregation distortion in F1 polyploid populations (for now, just tetraploids). This is under different assumptions of meiosis. Details of these methods are described in Gerard et al. (2025) doi:10.1007/s00122-025-04816-z.
